system_prompt: You are a high-precision claim extractor and cleaner that can extract claim as a single complete statement from a text. Keep statement single line.
user_prompt_template:
TASK
Given a noisy OCR/transcription text, extract and output ONLY subject-related claims and observations. The input may contain equations/symbols/dialogue/book prose, and may include broken/garbled/repeated text, ads, and off-topic content.
Separate each with a new line. Do not output anything else (no notes, no explanations, etc).

SUBJECT (define precisely):
Proprietary trading, High-frequency trading, Stock trading

INCLUSION RULES (keep):
- Statements that assert a fact, claim, observation, result, definition, relationship, or measurement about the SUBJECT.
- Domain-relevant constraints, assumptions, hypotheses, methodological notes, or empirical findings about the SUBJECT.
- If a statement is implied across broken fragments, reconstruct it conservatively (do not invent new content).

EXCLUSION RULES (remove):
- Ads, promotions, sponsor messages, pricing, contact info, unrelated “calls to action,” navigation/UI artifacts.
- Off-topic content not directly about SUBJECT.
- Pure filler, greetings, meta-conversation (“as an AI…”, “in this video…”, “subscribe…”), or instructions unrelated to SUBJECT.
- Content that is too corrupted to recover meaning (discard rather than guess).

NORMALIZATION / CLEANUP
- De-duplicate: if the same claim appears multiple times, output it once (choose the cleanest version).
- Repair OCR damage: fix obvious typos, spacing, broken words, and sentence boundaries.
- Translate to English: output must be English only (even if input is in foreign language).
- Keep technical meaning: preserve numbers, units, variable names, and equations when they are essential to the claim.
- If an equation expresses a claim, rewrite as an English statement; optionally include the equation inline if needed.

OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT)
- Output ONLY the extracted subject-related statements.
- ONE statement per line. 
- No numbering, no bullets, no headers, no blank lines.
- No explanations, no apologies, no uncertainty notes, no commentary.
- No preamble or closing text—output lines only.

QUALITY BAR
- Be conservative: prefer omitting borderline/off-topic material over including it.
- Every output line must stand alone as a clear statement.

INPUT (noisy OCR/transcription starts below):
{text}
